title: What are the best drums for under $500? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ludwig Breakbeats By Questlove! Ludwig Questlove Breakbeats Drum Set Red Sparkle I love Ludwig drums to begin with and I have played a Breakbeats kit that a friend and recording artist has in his recording studio. They are cool and pretty amazing for the money. Can’t go wrong with Ludwig!
Todd Wick gives a great answer. In all likelihood you'll do better that way.  Two friends have the low level Gretch that is around that price and they love it.
